sqlMap.select: SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.DEPT_NM FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID WHERE (YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID) IN (SELECT YEAR, SC_DEPT_ID FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE (METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR) IN (SELECT METRIC_GRP_ID, YEAR FROM BSC_METRIC WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND METRIC_ID = #findMetricId#) AND DELETE_DT IS NULL) AND OULEVEL < 2
SELECT DEPT_ID FROM ( SELECT DEPT_ID FROM BSC_SC_DEPT_MAPPING WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND SC_DEPT_ID = #findScDeptCd# ORDER BY DEPT_ID ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

select.isEqual: SELECT A.YEAR , A.MM AS MON , A.DEPT_CD , B.DEPT_NM , SUM(A.CUM_REQ_AMT) CUM_REQ_AMT , SUM(A.CUM_RE_REQ_AMT) CUM_RE_REQ_AMT , SUM(A.L_YEAR_AMT) L_YEAR_AMT , SUM(A.N_YEAR_AMT) N_YEAR_AMT FROM V_GHF0221D_003 A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_ID WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.MM = #findMon# AND B.DEPT_ID = #findDeptId# AND A.DEPT_CD > '6000' GROUP BY A.YEAR, A.MM, A.DEPT_CD, B.DEPT_NM

SELECT A.YY AS YEAR , A.MON , A.DEPT_CD , B.DEPT_NM , A.APRV_QUAT , A.BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM (SELECT YY , '01' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT1 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT1 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '02' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT1 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT1 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '03' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT1 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT1 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '04' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT2 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT2 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '05' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT2 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT2 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '06' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT2 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT2 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '07' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT3 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT3 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '08' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT3 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT3 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '09' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT3 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT3 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '10' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT4 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT4 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '11' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT4 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT4 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '12' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT4 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT4 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B) A INNER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_ID WHERE YY = #findYear# AND MON = #findMon# AND B.UP_DEPT_ID = #findDeptId# ORDER BY YY, MON, DEPT_CD

SELECT A.YEAR , A.MON , A.DEPT_ID , B.DEPT_NM , C.STIC_LAG_TC_NM , C.STIC_SML_TC_NM , SUM(A.PLAN_AMT) PLAN_AMT FROM (SELECT YEAR , CASE LENGTH (TO_CHAR (MON)) WHEN 1 THEN '0' || MON ELSE TO_CHAR (MON) END MON , DEPT_ID , ROLE_TC , PLAN_AMT FROM V_GHA0110D_001) A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN V_GHF0221D_003 C ON A.YEAR = C.YEAR AND A.MON = C.MM AND A.DEPT_ID = C.DEPT_CD WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND A.MON = #findMon# AND B.DEPT_ID = #findDeptId# AND A.DEPT_ID > '6000' GROUP BY A.YEAR , A.MON , A.DEPT_ID , B.DEPT_NM , C.STIC_LAG_TC_NM , C.STIC_SML_TC_NM

SELECT A.YY AS YEAR , A.MON , A.DEPT_CD , B.DEPT_NM , A.APRV_QUAT , A.BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM (SELECT YY , '01' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT1 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT1 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '02' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT1 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT1 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '03' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT1 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT1 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '04' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT2 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT2 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '05' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT2 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT2 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '06' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT2 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT2 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '07' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT3 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT3 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '08' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT3 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT3 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '09' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT3 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT3 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '10' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT4 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT4 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '11' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT4 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT4 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B UNION ALL SELECT YY , '12' AS MON , B.DEPT_CD , APRV_QUAT4 AS APRV_QUAT , BGT_RSLT_QUAT4 AS BGR_RSLT_QUAT FROM DUAL A, V_AAA0106M_001 B) A INNER JOIN BSC_DEPTINFO B ON A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_ID WHERE YY = #findYear# AND MON = #findMon# AND B.UP_DEPT_ID = #findDeptId# ORDER BY YY, MON, DEPT_CD

sqlMap.select: SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM FROM BSC_SYSTEM_ITEM A , BSC_CAL_TYPE_COL B WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND B.METRIC_ID = #findMetricId# AND B.INSERT_GUBUN = '01' ORDER BY B.CAL_TYPE_COL_NM
